assignments.description: Assign account id to var if it was found on the screen
assignments.name: asgAccountId_0
assignments.label: asgAccountId

assignments.description: Assign Contact id from the one selected on the screen.
assignments.name: Contact_Id
assignments.label: Contact Id

choices.description: default to create a contact or use existing based on formula.
choices.name: chsDefaultContactCreate

choices.description: This choice is the opposite of what the default choice is so that there are only two values in the picklist
choices.name: chsDefaultCreateContactOpposite
NoAccountCompanyNameStart
choices.choiceText: no Account given. Start of Company name matches. No email

decisions.description: Did they their combination of choices result in an an error?
decisions.name: dcs_Contact_Errors
decisions.label: dcs Contact Errors

decisions.description: Is the account provided before lead conversion button clicked?
decisions.name: desAccount_Provided
decisions.label: desAccountProvided

Flow.description: revised by Jessie Rymph in September 2024 to map description and reported by from Lead to Opportunity. Switched to a record collection variable instead of record choice set to allow for accounts with over 200 contacts. This version changes the contact's owner correctly to the chosen owner.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Get all contacts at the account into a collection choice set
dynamicChoiceSets.name: chsCollectionContacts

dynamicChoiceSets.description: the dropdown list shows contacts at this account or with the same email address.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: chsContacts

formulas.name: frmAccountFound
formulas.expression: IF({!Lead.Account__c}="" && {!varFoundAccountId}="","No account found matching " + {!Lead.Company}+". Search for it here.", IF({!varFoundAccountId}!="", "Is this the correct account?",""))

formulas.name: frmAllContactErrors
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!pckCreateContact}={!cnstUseExisting} ,{!Search_Contact.selectedChoiceValues}=''), 'You must create a new contact with the prefilled information from lead, or look up an existing contact. ', '') + IF(AND({!pckCreateContact}={!cnstUseExisting},{!varFoundContactId}='', {!Search_Contact.selectedChoiceValues} =''), 'You selected to use an existing contact, but did not search and find a contact.', '')

formulas.name: frmContactFound
formulas.expression: IF({!varFoundContactId}!="", "We found a matching contact for " +{!Lead.FirstName} + " " + {!Lead.LastName}, "No matching contact for " +{!Lead.FirstName} + " " + {!Lead.LastName} + " at this account. Can you find one?" )

formulas.name: frmCreatedItems
formulas.expression:
IF(OR({!varNewContact}!='',{!varNewOpportunity}!=''),
'We created ' + IF({!varNewContact}!='','a Contact','') + IF(AND( {!varNewContact}!='', {!varNewOpportunity}!='') , ' and ' ,'') + IF({!varNewOpportunity}!='', 'an Opportunity','') + ' for you. Click Next to open the ' + IF({!varNewOpportunity}!='', 'Opportunity.','Contact.'), 'You chose not to create any new record. Click Next to continue to the Contact you merged into.')

formulas.description: Used in the lookup for accounts. IF({!Lead.Account__c}="", "this is the account id of the one I looked up " +{!Get_Account.Id} ,"I will use the accountId from the lead which is " + {!Lead.Account__c} )
formulas.name: frmDefaultAccountId

formulas.description: This is the default value of create contact or use existing, based on if the contact ID has been found.
formulas.name: frmDefaultCreateContact

formulas.description: This is the opposite result so that the picklist only shows two values.
formulas.name: frmDefaultCreateContactOpposite

formulas.description: Checks if lead contact exists with this customer
formulas.name: frmExistingContact

formulas.description: remove double quotes from description because it breaks in Share Point if there are double quotes.
formulas.name: frmLeadDescriptionQuotes

formulas.description: if the lead owner is inactive, assign current user. otherwise, use owner of the lead.
formulas.name: frmOwnerId

Flow.label: Autolaunched - Lead: Convert Lead v2

recordCreates.description: change to find AccountId from varFoundAccountId instead of from Lead record.
recordCreates.name: Create_New_Contact1
recordCreates.label: Create Contact

recordLookups.description: Look up account based on the company name field on the lead.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordLookups.description: See if owner is currently active. If they are not, then we need a different owner. If the owner is Temp Owner, we also need a different owner.
recordLookups.name: Get_Owner
recordLookups.label: Get Owner

recordLookups.description: Get contacts only from the account or based on matching email.
recordLookups.name: GetContact
recordLookups.label: Contact

recordUpdates.description: Lead conversion field mapping does not allow to map custom field to standard field
recordUpdates.name: AddLeadDescription
recordUpdates.label: Add Lead Description

recordUpdates.description: The apex is not correctly setting the contact owner so we will set it here.
recordUpdates.name: upd_ContactOwner
recordUpdates.label: updateContactOwner

recordUpdates.description: If they looked up an account in the flow, update the lead's Account so the conversion process will work.
recordUpdates.name: Update_LeadAccount
recordUpdates.label: Update Lead Account

fields.name: errMsgApex
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, something went wrong during creation of Account or Opportunity.

System adminisntrator has been alerted.

Error message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
ERROR!


Lead conversion failed because:

{!frmAllContactErrors}


Click Next to review your choices and try again

screens.description: The user can look up the account or confirm that the flow found the correct one.
screens.name: FindMatchingAccount
screens.label: Find Matching Account

value.stringValue: Search here to find a matching contact.

fields.name: pckCreateContact
fields.fieldText: What would you like to do?

textTemplates.name: textTempUrlToServiceNow
textTemplates.text: If no matching Account can be found, go here to create a new Account in ServiceNow.

variables.description: Id of temporary Contact, Apex class always creates a new contact(!) If user selects "Use existing Contact" we need to delete the new contact
variables.name: tmpContactId

variables.description: If variable is null, the owner is not active and we need a new owner for the converted records.
variables.name: varActiveOwner

variables.description: This is the contactid at the very end. Either it was newly created or it was existing. This contact's owner Id will be updated.
variables.name: varfinalContactId
